question: Which among the following is incorrect about Cabinet system?
option1: The proceedings of the cabinet are kept secret
option2: The Prime Minister presides the cabinet meeting
option3: Members of the cabinet are chosen by the prime minister
option4: Inner cabinet has been stipulated by our constitution
answer: Inner cabinet has been stipulated by our constitution
explanation: Inner cabinet has not been stipulated by the Constitution. The Prime Minister of India presides the cabinet meeting. Members of cabinet are chosen by the Prime Minister. The proceedings of the cabinet are kept secret.
